description:
Circle, Square, Triangle!: Chevy and her friends go to the western area of Candy Land to meet with Harry, a Dragon Fruit flavored Hedgehog Zooble. After they played together, Chevy and Panky drank the water from the forbidden fountain, both their heads changed shape and they need to find a cure to change them back. But a lot of trouble occurs to during their journey to the only cure, especially encountering a lot of Rock Creatures along their way.
The Circles of Beauty: One day, Chevy and her friends went to the Rainbow Fountain just to find out no one`s around. They then encountered Panna, a Peach Yogurt flavored Panda Zooble. Chevy became totally shocked seeing her because she wanted to change Chevy`s tomboyish image and totally wants to style her to make her more feminine like other female zoobles do. This became a chase as Chevy is always running away from her to every area in Candy Land.

titles.title: Circle, Square, Triangle! / The Circles of Beauty
Marukute, Shikakute, Sankaku yo! / Kiyoku Utsukushiku Manmaruku
丸くて, 四角くて, 三角よ! / 清く美しくまん丸く
